testcase.name: Search users by its type and send the invitation and message
testcase.system-out: Given User is in the application............................................passed When login as a registered user "suman" "suman".............................passed And Navigate to the social network page search the "Divya" and its type and assert it.passed And click on send invitation and send the invitation request with "Please accept my invitation".passed Then Request sent successfully..............................................passed When click on send message button and send the "<subject>" and "Good morning Divya!".passed Then Message sent successfully..............................................passed
